text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes You DO KNOW the Coronavirus updates should be JUST THAT! I know your trying to compete with Gov. Cuomo -your not even on his level. I see your trying to tie yourself to him. Your TV persona is laughable. Your evening updates are NOT for your lame ratings. People are DYING!
